newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak NPF sells 15 pct stake in Slovnaft.
newsitem.headline: Slovak NPF sells 15 pct stake in Slovnaft.

text.p: The Slovak privatisation agency, the National Property Fund (NPF), approved the sale of a 15 percent stake in the country's sole oil refiner, Slovnaft a.s., the Fund said in a statement on Tuesday.
The NPF sold the stake for 384.61 million Slovak crowns to a management-led group Slovintegra a.s., according to the statement, which was published in national daily Narodna Obroda on Tuesday.
No further details were disclosed and NPF officials were not immediately available.
